blogPost.excerpt: StoryXpress is a video platform for high performing teams with a suite of video tools- webcam & screen recorder, video hosting, video editing & video analytics engine. With custom branding and powerful integrations for sales, marketing customer support tools.
blogPost.body: StoryXpress is a video platform for high performing teams with a suite of video tools- webcam & screen recorder, video hosting, video editing & video analytics engine. With custom branding and powerful integrations for sales, marketing customer support tools.
blogPost.title: StoryXpress - Video Platform for High Performing Teams
blogPost.author: Ankit Mishra

localize.description: StoryXpress是一个为高绩效团队提供的视频平台，它拥有一套视频工具--网络摄像头和屏幕录像机、视频托管、视频编辑和视频分析引擎。它拥有自定义的品牌和强大的销售、营销、客户支持工具的集成功能。
localize.tagline: 高绩效团队的视频平台

localize.description: StoryXpress是一個爲高績效團隊提供的視頻平臺，它擁有一套視頻工具--網絡攝像頭和屏幕錄像機、視頻託管、視頻編輯和視頻分析引擎。它擁有自定義的品牌和強大的銷售、營銷、客戶支持工具的集成功能。
localize.tagline: 高績效團隊的視頻平臺

previous.excerpt: The Unsplash app is home to over 2.5 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the world’s most generous community of photographers. Find the perfect image, collect your favorite, view your stats and more!
previous.title: Unsplash for iOS 2.0 - Internet’s source of freely-usable images on your phone

localize.description: Unsplash应用程序是世界上最慷慨的摄影师社区为您带来的超过250万张免费高分辨率图片的家园。寻找完美的图片，收集你最喜欢的图片，查看你的统计资料等等。
localize.tagline: 互联网上免费使用的图片资源在您的手机上。

localize.description: Unsplash應用程序是世界上最慷慨的攝影師社區爲您帶來的超過250萬張免費高分辨率圖片的家園。尋找完美的圖片，收集你最喜歡的圖片，查看你的統計資料等等。
localize.tagline: 互聯網上免費使用的圖片資源在您的手機上。
